Seven Sing Commands: //ssq_change - Change SSQ State Usage - //ssq_change 1 2 3 (Reg/Competition/Validation) //ssq_time - Set time to start next period Usage - //ssq_time Hours Time //ssq_cabal - Add or Change Character Registration after competition Usage - //ssq_cabal 1 arg Char_Object_Id 2 arg 0 - not reg 1 - dust 2 - dawn 3 arg 1 - not reg 2 - avarice 3 - gnosis 4 - strife Read GM Ban Read GM Skills Read GM Clan Read GM Residence(Castle Edit) Read GM Seven Sing Read GM Olympiad Read GM Cursed Weapons Read GM Zone
